thread.title: World record broken for howling at the moon
thread.title_full: World record broken for howling at the moon - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: World record broken for howling at the moon
text:
Play video Have you ever thought of howling at the moon?
Now a Bedfordshire scream park has smashed the Guinness World Record for most people howling, when 464 visitors howled for the required minute.
The previous record of 296 people howling was set in 2013 by students at St Cloud State University in Minnesota, USA.
The Howling word record attempt was held on Saturday 10th October 2015 to mark the opening night of The Howl, a new scream park Halloween attraction at Mead Open Farm near Leighton Buzzard.
In preparation for the world record attempt participants were given a lesson in wolf howling by Fausta DiMascio a volunteer from the UK Wolf Conservation Trust.
"It was fantastic to listen to nearly 500 people howling in unison. Some of the participants really got into the spirit of the event and came dressed as werewolves. It has been an amazing opening night and we look forward to welcoming many more visitors to The Howl between now and Halloween."
â€“ Matt Heast, Mead Open Farm Entertainment Bedfordshire
